                                             boolean strand)
Loads information for positioning unweighted isoforms into global arrays where they will be drawn through the draw function.

Parameters:
iAbsoluteStartOfGene - the genomic coordinate of the gene (inclusive)
iAbsoluteLengthOfGene - the genomic length of the gene (inclusive)
strand - the direction of the gene (false means non coding)
isoforms - a collection of MRNA

isoform - the isoform you want to find compatible reads for
iShortReads - the arrayList of SAMRecords you want to check against
Returns:

identifyConstituitiveBases

private ArrayList<Integer> identifyConstituitiveBases(Collection<gffParser.MRNA> mrnaList)
Returns an ArrayList of genomic coordinates which are constitutive. This method works by plotting all the coordinates for each MRNA. It then iteratively goes through each coordinate and determines if the number of "hits" for the coordinate equal the number of MRNAs in the list

Parameters:
mrnaList - is a Collection of MRNA.
Returns:
An ArrayList of constitutive genomic coordinates are returned.

isFoundAmongAllMRNA

private boolean isFoundAmongAllMRNA(Collection<gffParser.MRNA> mrnaList,
                                    int absolutePosition)
Checks if position is found among all isoforms. Performs an exhaustive search among all exons start coords

Parameters:
mrnaList - the MRNA list to check against
absolutePosition - the absolute position
Returns:
true, if checks if is found among all pieces

getRectUnderMouse

private Rectangle_Weighted getRectUnderMouse()
Gets the WeightedRectangle underneath the mouse. Iterates through the array of weightedIsoforms and checks to see if the mouse is over it. If so, it returns the rectangle.

Returns:
a Rectangle_Weighted that is underneath the mouse coordinates. If there is none, return is null
